About.title: About VueloTransparente
About.missionText: VueloTransparente was created to provide real-time, accessible data on flight delays and cancellations in Venezuela. We believe that transparency is the first step towards improving service quality.
About.methodologyText: We use the Aviationstack API to track flights departing from Maiquet√≠a (CCS). We analyze scheduled vs. actual departure times to calculate delays independently.
About.disclaimerText: This tool is for informational purposes only. Data is provided 'as is' and may not always reflect last-minute changes by airlines.
About.supportText: If you find this tool useful, consider supporting its maintenance.
